1.content: You were walking home with your friend ______ when you suddenly shrink!
1.title: The Begining

choices: No, an animal comes along though
No, and she steps on you
11.content:
You were walking home from school with your friend Lindsay, who also happens to be your ex-girlfriend. She was wearing a white top with a blue white-striped jacket and jeans, and black low top chuck taylors. As you were walking with her, you suddenly shrink to 3 inches tall. You have no idea what just happened, and you feel a little dizzy. You shake your head and everything is HUGE. You're barely taller than the grass! And then you saw Lindsay. She was the biggest thing you've ever seen. She was a giantess in your eyes. "Jake? Jake, where'd you go?" She said, confused, looking around for you.

Does she spot you?
11.title: Lindsay

choices: At her house, she pulls you out.
She decides to go to a friend's house (unaware)
She goes to a friend's house and shows you to her friend.
111.content: Lindsay's looking left and right, wondering where the hell you went. Then she sees movement on the ground. You start waving your arms, hoping she'll see you. "Oh.....my......god....Jake?" She says leaning down close to the ground, spotting you. Her massive frame gets larger and larger as she leans down. With her massive fingers she plucks you up off the ground, and places you on her open palm while standing up. "Why're you tiny?!" Lindsay asked you. "Well...I don't know...I just, kinda shrank I guess." You tell her. "Oh...well are you ok?" She asks you, hoping she didn't step on you. "Yes, I'm fine, a little freaked out but fine." you tell her. "Well, I'll take you to my house, k?" And before you could say a word, she shoved you in her pocket.
111.title: Spotted

1111.content: She places you on her kitchen table, her parents are gone and wont return for about two days. She bends down and looks at you. "your so small" She smiles, she stands up and plucks you off the table. She carrys you gently to her room, then plops down on her bed and places you on her lap. "wanna play a game?" She asks with a flirty smile. "um...ok" You say woundering what she has in mind. She then...
1111.title: At her house, she pulls you out.

choices: I'm not so happy with you" (She tortures you)
11112.content: "I don't like you with your clothes on...remember?" Lindsay says with a wink. Lindsay then lifts you from her lap and rips off your shoes and socks, then your shirt, then your pants, and finally she tears off your boxers. "Much better. I'll have so much more fun playing with you now." Lindsay says with an evil smile. "Now...
11112.title: You're Naked

111122.content: "Jake, now that you're tiny and helpless, I have nothing to fear in saying this. I'm really upset we broke up. I thought things were going well. I even had dreams of one day marrying you. But you ended those dreams, abruptly. And now, I think you'll pay for your crimes Jake. Now, the question is, how do I want to punish you? I could do imprisonment, or I could full out torture you, possibly painfully. Oh what to do." Lindsay says to you. You just gape up at her in awe from her lap.
111122.title: Torture

choices: Lindsay saw you dart in her little sister's room and grabs you
Lindsay has no idea where you went, and gives up on looking for now
1111221.content: As Lindsay's pondering how she can make your life hell, you decide that you aren't going to just sit in her lap and wait for her to pick something. You jump off her lap and run, sliding down the covers on the bed onto her floor, and you make a break for the slightly cracked door. You then hear "Hey! Jake! Get back here!" and realized she noticed you'd bailed. You slips through crack and run into the hall of bedrooms. You bolt into the closest doorway that isn't Lindsay's. You take a quick look around to see that this is her little sister, Kelsey,'s room.
1111221.title: Make a break for it

choices: Lindsay calls up a friend or two.
11112211.content: But right as you dart into Kelsey's room, the door opens and you turn around to see a very large, very angry Lindsay. "You shouldn't have run Jake, now things will only be worse for you." Lindsay said, before bending over and grabbing you. You were very fearful, and tried squirming in her steel grip, but at your size, you were helpless in the hands of this giant teenage girl.Lindsay carries you back to her room and sits on her bed, then brings you up to her angry face. "Hmm...how can I make torture so much worse now that you've tried escaping me? Ooh! I know." She says, ending with a wicked smile that scares you to death.
11112211.title: Escape Attempt:: Failed

choices: Her sister Kelsey or her dog, Roscoe.
111122112.content: "I'm going to give you away" Lindsay tells you. Your jaw drops, because you certainly did not expect this. Who does Lindsay give you away to?
111122112.title: Lindsay gives you away.

1111221121.content:
"I think Kasey or Carly would LOVE to have you" Lindsay says, worsening your fear.


Kasey: 5 foot 6, long black hair, D cup, in short, kind of a bitch. She's very mean, and in your case, you being tiny, she would only consider you property to do with what she pleases. To her you would be a slave or toy.

Carly: 5 foot 7, long brown hair, C cup, she's unpredictable and weird. She would probably love to play with you whether as a tiny friend or pet, or as a toy, but she might not be against the idea of making you into her slave. Her feet usually stink pretty bad.
1111221121.title: One of her friends.

11112211211.content: lindsay calls kasey and asks to meet. lindsay says: I'm going to take you to kasey's house, she'll take care of you, but where will I take you. with a lindsay smile
11112211211.title: Kasey

1111221122.content: "Hmm, I could give you to my sister, I'm sure she'd do some things to you..." Lindsay says, scaring you. "Or, I could always give you to Roscoe. Lord knows what he'll do to you. You might become a chew toy, his plain property, maybe he'll use you to pleasure him? He doesn't have any lady dogs around, that I know. Or hell maybe he'll eat you, and I'll find you in a pile of his poop out in the yard in a week." Lindsay says, terrifying you even more.
1111221122.title: Kelsey or Roscoe

choices: He uses you to get off
11112211222.content: What does Roscoe do with you?
11112211222.title: Roscoe

11112212.content: You quickly move out of the door frame to under a dresser that's right next to Kelsey's door. You listen, and can tell Lindsay doesn't know where you went. You then hear her go back into her room crying, because you've escaped her for the second time. You feel bad for making her cry, but realize going back just means torture. It would make her happy though....but do you care about Lindsay's feelings enough that you would go back to her and be tortured just to make her happy?
11112212.title: Go Back?

111122122.content: No, you DO care about Lindsay's feelings, but not so much you'll endure torture from her. Let her cry, she got over it last time...you think...and she'll get over it this time. Although, you're not sure if its a good idea to stay in Kelsey's room. She absolutely hates you, and having you helpless and under her power would make her a happy, evil little girl. But just as you're thinking that, the giant 10 year old herself storms through the door, and kicks off her shoes. One of her shoes lands right next to you, and the smell coming from it makes you wanna gag. Does Kelsey see you?
111122122.title: Kelsey

1111221221.content: "Hey, what's that?" Kelsey said, then her giant feet began pounding toward you, until her massive frame towered over you, casting a huge shadow over you.
1111221221.title: Spotted

11112212211.content: "Disgusting, a bug!" Kelsey said. She talked arrogantly to you, "well, since you are a bug..."
11112212211.title: She thinks you're a bug.

111122122111.content:
“I think being crushed under my foot would be appropriate.” Kelsey said. At the sound of hearing this, you immediately started to run away. The giantess simply smiled and raised her foot over you. She brought it down, just barely missing you. “Go ahead, run. It won’t matter anyways.”

As you were running, trying to quickly find cover, Kelsey stepped over you. You fell backwards as she turned around and raised her foot again. It came down right on your legs. Though the giantess was wearing socks, it didn’t lessen the pain any. You screamed as she increased the pressure, soon crushing your bones completely.

“Hehe, got ya.” Kelsey said, raising her foot again. This time, she covered the rest of your body. Her foot smelled horrible, it almost made you pass out. The giantess increased the pressure a little bit and started to rub her foot on you. Though it was soft, you felt pathetic. You just wanted her to finish you off.

As if hearing your wish, Kelsey started to increase the pressure again. She continued until you were flat as a pancake. “Good riddance.” She said, and walked off. You remained a simple dead spot on her floor. Nobody ever knew the entire truth about you.
111122122111.title: Your Deadly Crush

111122122112.content:
"Might as well eat ya~!" Kelsey beams, her stomach growling below. The 10-year-old loved to eat bugs and squish them under her bare feet, and since she was feeling hungry, you looked like a perfect snack.

Kelsey opened her mouth wide and dropped you on her tongue. She enjoyed your sweet and salty taste, then gulped your puny body down into her stomach. The inside of Kelsey's belly greeted you with a humid, acidic atmosphere and a deep gurgle.

Outside, Kelsey felt something rumbling in her tummy, and proudly emitted a loud burp. The tomboy took pride in her stomach's affinity for producing powerful belches.

Meanwhile, you...
111122122112.title: Kelsey eats you

1111221221121.content:
You feel powerless against the mighty stomach, and it's low Ph. The acid is quickly eating away at you, forcibly pulling out your nutrients, and redistributing them to 10 year old Kelsey.

Your last thought before your mind is absorbed is that there is SO MUCH cruelty in the world.
1111221221121.title: Are digested

choices: Going to keep you as my very own pet.
11112212212.content: You cower as she looks right at you. Although Kelsey is a brat she is very cute for her age. She has the same long blond hair as her sister and the same blue eyes. She recognizes you instantly and a broad smile spreads across her face. "Jake..is that you?" She asks. You look around to see if there is any place to run. There isn't. You nod and squeak out a yes. She reaches down towards you. She sees that you have a real frightened look on your face and she pulls her hand back. "Don't be scared Jake, I'm not going to hurt you. " You don't really believe her, but there is no way to escape so you say "OK". She reaches down and grabs you with her right hand, wrapping her skinny fingers around you. She takes you over to her desk and places you on top, while she sits down on her wooden chair. She stares at you with her light blue eyes, still smiling. "Please don't hurt me Kelsey!" You yell up to her. The smile sort of fades and she says "Why would I hurt you Jake?" She moves her face in closer. I'm...
11112212212.title: She knows it's you.

111122122122.content: "What?!" You yell back up to her. "I said I love you." She has a serious look on her face. You can't believe what she is telling you. You has always been such an evil little brat. You remember when she tied firecrackers to the tail of a neighbors cat. She starts giggling. "Why are you naked?" She asks still giggling. "Umm well, umm your sister.." You start to say but she cuts in. "Say no more. Giggles. Well she saved me the trouble of taking your clothes off. I like you better like this. " She leans in a little closer to get a better look at you. You try to cover up your nakedness with your arms. "Wow you must be like 3 inches tall. I wonder how long you will stay like this?" "Please Kelsey, take me home." you beg. "Ha! no way. Do you know how long I have waited for a chance to have you to myself? Ever since my sister first brought you home. This is my chance. Don't worry, I will be so sweet to you." Kelsey says. But the evil little smile on her face tells you she may not be completely right in the head. So love to her may mean something all together different. Well Jake let's...
111122122122.title: In love with you.

A little box which she has stuffed a pair of dirty socks into.

She looks so much like a younger version of her sister. Although she is more of a tomboy than Lindsay. You then look around to see if you can escape, but being so high up on her desk makes that impossible. So you just sit down on the desk and watch Kelsey rummage through her cluttered room. "Ah ha. Here we go this should make a great bed for you." She says as she comes back over to the desk with ...

11112212212211.content: "That's my bed?!" You ask confused. "Yeah don't you like it?" She says smiling. You sit there with a confused look. She sits the white (now gray) shoe with blue strips down near you. The smell wafts over and almost makes you gag. There are several small tears in it and the laces are gray and dirty. "I can't sleep in there!" You protest. "Why not? She says "Don't you...
11112212212211.title: A very old, dirty, and ratty looking tennis shoe.

111122122122111.content: You sit there shocked. How did she know about your foot fetish? "I-I do not!" You protest. "Don't pretend you don't Jake. Lindsey told me all about it." She says. Crap she outed you. "She did?" You ask looking up into her face. "Well not exactly. I heard her talking to some of her friends about it. She had them over for a sleep over, but wouldn't let me join them. So I hid behind the couch. Jake they were all laughing about it." She says with a sad look on her face. "They were?" You ask looking ashamed. "Yeah but I didn't. I think it's sweet that you want to be at a girls feet." She says. Her little grin returning. "You do?" You ask not really believing what she is saying. The whole time you have known her she wouldn't miss the chance to make fun of you about anything. Could she be trying to make fun of this too somehow? She picks you up in her hand and walks over to her bed as she continues talking. "I use to watch you rub my sisters feet when you would come over after school and sit on the couch watching T.V. I use to wish you would ask to rub mine. I would even paint my toes and run around barefoot in front of you hoping you would notice them. And the reason I brought you my old shoe was I was watching you one day when you didn't think I was around and Lindsey had gone to the bathroom. You went over by the front door and picked up her shoe. You then started smelling it." She puts you on the bed. You have turned beat red knowing that she saw you doing that. "She sits down on the bed and says. "Then do you know what you did next?" You look up at her afraid of what she is going to say. "You put her shoe down and picked up one of mine! Then you not only sniffed it you put your whole face into it. Now that almost gave me away because I did laugh and had to cover my mouth. But you were so into my shoe that you didn't notice. You must have really liked what you smelled since you held it to your face until you heard Lindsey flush the toilet. I was so happy. I figured if I could get you to myself, I could use my feet to get you to like me." You watch her as she is telling you this. "Oh God, she knows, she saw!" You think to yourself. She continues. "Now I see that you have only two choices here. One you agree to be my boyfriend and I let you play with my feet and shoes all you want. Or two. I make you my boyfriend by making you my foot slave and giving you more of my feet than you can handle. But believe me either way we will both have a lot of fun together." She has the biggest grin on her evil little face. "So what will it be Jake? Want to be my boyfriend?"
111122122122111.title: Your secret is out.

1111221221221111.content:
"Hehe Great! Oh, we're going to have so much fun! Oh I'm so happy to have my very own teeny tiny little sexy boyfriend!" She says as she giggles down at you. "Oh Jake thank you! I love you so much!" She lifts you up and kisses you multiple times, her giant, soft and plush lips enveloping you in her candy scent. You can't lie that you were already happy you said yes, and your friend down below was happy as well. "Oh jake! You've made me so happy. And to show you how much I appreciate your cooperation~..." She then sits on the bed, lowering you onto it as well. You blush as you get ideas as to what she might do to you.. er.. for you? She scoots back then lifts her bare, dirty, soft, sweaty, and smelly feet right in front of you! You've snuck glances when you came over before but this was entirely new! For only being 10 she had big feet, you'd gauge around 7 to 8. Her feet smell like sweat and feet of course, cheesey with a hint of vinegar. Definitely stronger and better than her socks and shoes! Bits of dirt clung to her sole and under her soft toes, She wiggled them and bits fell off onto the bed.the depressions her heels made in the bed instantly drew you closer towards them. That and the scents and sights drew you in as well. You eventually found your legs moving closer towards them.. your mind entranced by her cute, sexy, soft feet. Eventually you find yourself right infront of her heel and you find your arms reaching forward. Helpless you feel your hands reach out and sink into her foot flesh. She giggles "hehe..I can feel you poking my foot~" She coos softly. You smile and keep going.You press into her foot and find her foot flesh very yielding. You lay on it and find yourself sink into it like a tempur-pedic mattress. Perhaps she'd let you use it as one later on."So... you like them?" She asks cutely. You look behind her foot, smile, and nod. Your face you could feel was bright red

"This is... the greatest thing ever Kelsey.. t-thank you." You were honestly speechless that a girl was indulging in your foot fetish and that girl being your new girlfriend! Kelsey just giggles cutely once more

"You're welcome cutie! But... are you just going to rub them or are you going to do more?" She asks rather seductively. She did have a point. You have a whole giantess and her feet to yourself. Just what are you going to do?
1111221221221111.title: You say yes.

choices: She starts to put her bare foot in it.
She covers the opening with her foot.
1111221221221112.content: "Kelsey, I would if you were older, but you're just too young for me." You say trying to reason with her. Can you really reason with a ten year old? Kelsey sighs and kind of pouts and says. "I thought you might say that. But if you haven't noticed I pretty much own you and there isn't anything you can do about it." You shiver at the thought. "I know you'll come to see how I could be the best girl friend. She slowly reaches down and picks you up. "I think you might enjoy some time in my shoe." She says as she lowers you into her old sneaker. The smell hits you almost at once. A kind of sour cheesy smell. You almost gag. At your size the smell is magnified ten fold. You fall to your hands and knees. You look around and see the black impression made by her heel. You are right in the middle of it. "Isn't that smell great. If you liked the small of my other shoes then you must love these." She teases. You try to stand but your knees are week. She then picks up the old shoe and tilts it so you roll down into the toe. The smell is even stronger down there and it's also more humid. You then feel her lower her shoe and start giggling.
1111221221221112.title: You say no.

Its really tight in her pocket and you can barely breath. Scared, you scream at her to let you out but she cant even hear you. next thing you know you hear a door open and close and then a hand comes down and grabs you out of her pocket.
who's house is she at?

11121.content:
You look around and then look up at Lindsay and ask, "Why are we at Serena's house?" Lindsay smiles and says, "Well, to be honest, I don't know how you shrunk but it makes me happy. This is my perfect opportunity to get back at you for breaking my heart." She goes on to explain, "I heard you have a crush on Serena and she likes you to but how horrible would it be if something happened to you at this height and it would be her fault. I think were about to have a good time."
Just then Serena walks up and Lindsay quickly shoves you in her?
11121.title: Serena 14

111212.content:
It is hot in her bra and you can feel as she walks up stairs while they have normal conversation. When they get to Serena's room, Lindsay closes the door and sits next to her friend on the bed.
"So do you really like Jake?" Lindsay asks Serena.
"Yeah I do. Actually a lot. I was thinking about asking him out but I don't want you to get mad at me for going out with your ex." Serena responds.
"I wouldn't get mad at you! He's a nice guy. We just didn't get along with each other but you guys are really close friends and I think he deserves to be with you forever." Lindsay says with a smile.
"Well that just made me really happy! Thanks! Hey, I'm hungry. Do you want to go get some food from the kitchen and watch a movie in my room with me?" Serena asks.
"Sure! but let me go get the food. You hang out here. I'll surprise you with something." Lindsay says.
With you still in her bra, Lindsay runs down stares to the kitchen. She pulls you out of her bra and sets you on the counter and tells you not to go anywhere or else. She turns around and goes to the fridge.
111212.title: Her bra.

12.content:
You were walking home with Serena, whom you have the biggest crush on. You and her came from the school, and you're stopping by her house first, as it is nearest to the school. Her house was very near at the moment, only about 10 yards away. She was much shorter than you, but little did you know that wouldn't mean much soon. As you were talking with her, making jokes and making her giggle cutely in the way you love, something strange came over you. It was an odd sensation, overtaking your entire body, filling it with a weird tingling sensation, followed by numbness, loss of direction, dizziness, then loss of balance completely. And finally loss of consciousness.


When you finally awoke, you looked up to see a gigantic Serena. She used to be shorter than you, but now she towered over you, like a giantess, a goddess. It was amazing and awe-inspiring, and yet at the same time fearful. Amazing her colossal size appeared, yet fearful how she could destroy you with one misplaced step. Now you must decide if its best to get her attention and help, or to run off, to live on your own or find another's help. "Jake, where did you go?" Serena suddenly asked, finally noticing your absence. Serena looked around, and her eyes started wavering themselves close to where you were hiding.
12.title: Serena

choices: Smiles (She's gonna have fun with you--play/torture)
Frowns (She's concerned, she wants to help you)
Gets Mad For Some Reason (Cruel torture)
121.content: Serena's eyes finally land upon the spot from which you reside. You wave your arms, hoping she sees you. "Serena!" You shout, trying to get her attention. Her mouth suddenly drops open. This is when you know she's seen you. "J-Jake? Is that really you?" She asks. You nod, and she can apparently see this, even though you're only 1 inch tall. She finally recovers from the initial shock from seeing you tiny, and reaches out her hand and grabs you. This is quite annoying, as it makes you seem powerless, but considering Serena could end your life in mere seconds, you didn't object. Then Serena...
121.title: She Sees You

1211.content: Then a huge smile appears on Serena's face. "Oooh Jake we're going to have some fun with you at your new size!" She says to you, while you're in her fist, near her face. She quickly makes her way inside her house, then proceeds up to her room. She locks the door behind her and sits on her bed. She pulls the hand with you in it back up to her face and studies you, the smile still there. "Jake do you realize how many things we can do now that you're tiny?" Serena asks you. Its quite intimidating, being completely closed in and trapped by Serena's fist, with her face 20 feet (your scale) away, and the fact that she's gigantic. Next something ______-related happens.

14.content:
You had gone to the pool with your friend Makayla and were just heading back. Both of you still had your swimwear on, and had so much fun. Suddenly, your head started to hurt a little, making you lose your balance.

"Jake, are you ok?" Makayla asked. She grabbed you so you didn't fall down, however, that didn't stop whatever was happening. Before you knew it, you shrunk down to 3 inches right in front of your friend. Her eyes widened as you got smaller. Your swim shorts from your visit to the pool shrunk with you. Your headache was going away, you still were shocked at what happened. Makayla bent over to pick you up gently.

"Makayla! Please take me to the hospital, I don't want to stay like this." You said, however, your friend had a different idea.

"You're so cute! We're going to have so much fun!" She said excitedly.

"Makayla, please!" You pleaded, however she already made up her mind. The giantess put you between her breasts and started walking. Every step felt like a tremor at your size, and you weren't sure what she was planning.
